entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
